question: O KPI 'average_spent_per_campaign' é definido como: Média de investimento (mark_spent) por campanha.

question: top 3 unpopular musician
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, COUNT(*) AS TotalTracks
FROM Artist a
LEFT JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
LEFT JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalTracks ASC
LIMIT 3;

question: What are the top 10 Jazz artists by sales per year?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, strftime('%Y', i.InvoiceDate) AS Year, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
JOIN Invoice i ON il.InvoiceId = i.InvoiceId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
WHERE g.Name = 'Jazz'
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name, Year
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 10;

question: what are the top 5 jazz artists by sales?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
WHERE g.Name = 'Jazz'
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

What are the low 7 artists by sales?
content:

FROM Artist a
INNER JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId

question: O KPI 'total_impressions' é definido como: Soma total de impressões geradas em todas as campanhas.
content: SELECT SUM(impressions) AS total_impressions FROM tabela_marketing;

question: Can you provide a breakdown of total sales by employee and genre?
content:
SELECT e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName, g.GenreId, g.Name AS Genre, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Employee e
JOIN Customer c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId
JOIN Invoice i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON i.InvoiceId = il.InvoiceId
JOIN Track t ON il.TrackId = t.TrackId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
GROUP BY e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName, g.GenreId, g.Name;

question: 向我展示最受欢迎的5位艺术家的姓名
content:
SELECT a.Name
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Can you show me all the record names and their sales for the top 2 artists?
content:
SELECT t.Name AS TrackName, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
WHERE a.ArtistId IN (
    SELECT a.ArtistId
    FROM Artist a
    JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
    JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
    JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
    GROUP BY a.ArtistId
    ORDER BY SUM(il.Quantity) DESC
    LIMIT 2
)
GROUP BY t.TrackId, t.Name;

question: 按销售额排名前五位的艺术家是谁？
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: Give me the customer's that were served by employee Jane Peacock?
content:
SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email
FROM Customer c
JOIN Employee e ON c.SupportRepId = e.EmployeeId
WHERE e.FirstName = 'Jane' AND e.LastName = 'Peacock';

question: How do sales vary based on the support representative assigned to a customer?
content:
SELECT e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName, SUM(i.Total) AS TotalSales
FROM Employee e
JOIN Customer c ON e.EmployeeId = c.SupportRepId
JOIN Invoice i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId
GROUP BY e.EmployeeId, e.FirstName, e.LastName;

question: What are the most popular hip-hop artists?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, COUNT(*) AS TotalTracks
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
WHERE g.Name = 'Hip Hop/Rap'
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalTracks DESC
LIMIT 3;

question: me mostre os gastos semanais de cada campanha
content:
WITH weekly_spent AS (
    SELECT 
        campaign_name,
        CASE 
            WHEN c_date BETWEEN '2021-02-01' AND '2021-02-07' THEN 'Semana 1'
            WHEN c_date BETWEEN '2021-02-08' AND '2021-02-14' THEN 'Semana 2'
            WHEN c_date BETWEEN '2021-02-15' AND '2021-02-21' THEN 'Semana 3'
            WHEN c_date BETWEEN '2021-02-22' AND '2021-02-28' THEN 'Semana 4'
        END AS semana,
        SUM(mark_spent) AS total_spent
    FROM tabela_marketing 
    WHERE c_date BETWEEN '2021-02-01' AND '2021-02-28'
    GROUP BY campaign_name, semana
)
SELECT * FROM weekly_spent
ORDER BY campaign_name, semana;

question: What are the top 5 jazz artists by sales?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
WHERE g.Name = 'Jazz'
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: 我想看一下数据库中的表都有什么

Retrieve a list of customers who have made at least one purchase. Include their contact information, the total amount they’ve spent, the number of purchases, the average order value, and their most frequently purchased track_id.
content:
SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.Phone, SUM(i.Total) AS TotalAmountSpent,
COUNT(DISTINCT i.InvoiceId) AS NumberOfPurchases, AVG(i.Total) AS AverageOrderValue,
(SELECT il.TrackId FROM InvoiceLine il
JOIN Invoice i ON il.InvoiceId = i.InvoiceId
WHERE i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId
GROUP BY il.TrackId
ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
LIMIT 1) AS MostFrequentlyPurchasedTrackId
FROM Customer c
JOIN Invoice i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId
GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.Phone;

question: Can you show me the artist name, all the record names and their sales for the top 2 artists?
content:
SELECT a.Name AS ArtistName, t.Name AS TrackName, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
WHERE a.ArtistId IN (
    SELECT a.ArtistId
    FROM Artist a
    JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
    JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
    JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
    GROUP BY a.ArtistId
    ORDER BY SUM(il.Quantity) DESC
    LIMIT 2
)
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name, t.TrackId, t.Name;

question: What are the top 7 artists by sales order by sales?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
INNER JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
INNER JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
INNER JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 7;

question: What is the average track count for hip-hop artists?
content:
SELECT AVG(TrackCount) AS AverageTrackCount
FROM (
    SELECT COUNT(*) AS TrackCount
    FROM Artist a
    JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
    JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
    JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
    WHERE g.Name = 'Hip Hop/Rap'
    GROUP BY a.ArtistId
) AS Subquery;

question: Plano de treinamento do cliente 01
content:
[{"item_type": "is", "item_group": "kpisempresas.public", "item_name": "cli01_kpis_definicoes", "item_value": "The following columns are in the cli01_kpis_definicoes table in the kpisempresas database:

|    | table_catalog   | table_schema   | table_name            | column_name   | data_type   |
|---:|:----------------|:---------------|:----------------------|:--------------|:------------|

question:
Retrieve a list of customers who have made at least 5 purchase. 
Include their contact information, the total amount they've spent, 
the number of purchases, the average order value, and their most frequently purchased track_id.
content:
SELECT c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.Phone, 
       SUM(i.Total) AS TotalAmountSpent,
       COUNT(DISTINCT i.InvoiceId) AS NumberOfPurchases, 
       AVG(i.Total) AS AverageOrderValue,
       (SELECT il.TrackId 
        FROM InvoiceLine il
        JOIN Invoice i ON il.InvoiceId = i.InvoiceId
        WHERE i.CustomerId = c.CustomerId
        GROUP BY il.TrackId
        ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC
        LIMIT 1) AS MostFrequentlyPurchasedTrackId
FROM Customer c
JOIN Invoice i ON c.CustomerId = i.CustomerId
GROUP BY c.CustomerId, c.FirstName, c.LastName, c.Email, c.Phone
HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT i.InvoiceId) >= 5;

question: 向我展示最受欢迎的5位艺术家的销量
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: O KPI 'cost_per_lead' é definido como: Custo por lead: mark_spent / leads.

question: what are the top 5 jazz artists by sales？
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
JOIN Genre g ON t.GenreId = g.GenreId
WHERE g.Name = 'Jazz'
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 5;

question: What is the average sales per artist?
content:
SELECT AVG(subquery.TotalSales) AS AverageSalesPerArtist
FROM (
    SELECT a.ArtistId, SUM(il.Quantity * il.UnitPrice) AS TotalSales
    FROM Artist a
    JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
    JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
    JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
    GROUP BY a.ArtistId
) subquery;

question: show all table names
content:
SELECT name
FROM sqlite_master
WHERE type = 'table'
ORDER BY name;

question: Who is the artist with the highest sales?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: Qual o CPC (custo por clique) de cada campanha?

What is the total sales for each playlist?
content:
SELECT p.PlaylistId, p.Name, SUM(il.UnitPrice * il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Playlist p
JOIN PlaylistTrack pt ON p.PlaylistId = pt.PlaylistId
JOIN Track t ON pt.TrackId = t.TrackId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY p.PlaylistId, p.Name;

question: me mostre a campanha que teve maior gasto no dia 20 de fevereiro
content: SELECT campaign_name, SUM(mark_spent) AS total_spent FROM tabela_marketing WHERE c_date = '2021-02-20' GROUP BY campaign_name ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 1;

question: me informe o nome das campanhas que tiveram maior gasto de mercado no ano de 2021
content: SELECT campaign_name FROM tabela_marketing WHERE c_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY mark_spent DESC;

question: What is the average unit price of tracks in each genre?
content:
SELECT g.GenreId, g.Name AS Genre, AVG(t.UnitPrice) AS AverageUnitPrice
FROM Genre g
JOIN Track t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId
GROUP BY g.GenreId, g.Name;

question: What is the average unit price for each playlist?
content:
SELECT p.PlaylistId, p.Name, AVG(t.UnitPrice) AS AverageUnitPrice
FROM Playlist p
JOIN PlaylistTrack pt ON p.PlaylistId = pt.PlaylistId
JOIN Track t ON pt.TrackId = t.TrackId
GROUP BY p.PlaylistId, p.Name;

question: O KPI 'campaign_with_highest_roi' é definido como: Nome da campanha (campaign_name) com o maior ROI.
content:
SELECT campaign_name, (SUM(revenue) - SUM(mark_spent)) / SUM(mark_spent) AS roi 
FROM tabela_marketing 
GROUP BY campaign_name 
ORDER BY roi DESC 
LIMIT 1;

question: O KPI 'return_on_investment' é definido como: ROI: (revenue - mark_spent) / mark_spent * 100.
content: SELECT (SUM(revenue) - SUM(mark_spent)) / NULLIF(SUM(mark_spent), 0) * 100 AS return_on_investment FROM tabela_marketing;

question: Quais campanhas tiveram um gasto total entre 1.000.000 e 2.000.000?

question: show me all the sales for Hip Hop/Rap

JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId

FROM Artist a
JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId

question: What is the average sales per genre?
content:

FROM (
    SELECT g.GenreId, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
    FROM Genre g
    JOIN Track t ON g.GenreId = t.GenreId
    JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
    GROUP BY g.GenreId
) subquery;

question: What is the most popular media type in terms of sales?
content:
SELECT mt.MediaTypeId, mt.Name AS MediaType, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM MediaType mt
JOIN Track t ON mt.MediaTypeId = t.MediaTypeId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY mt.MediaTypeId, mt.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 1;

question: What are the top 10 artists by sales?
content:
SELECT a.ArtistId, a.Name, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM Artist a
INNER JOIN Album al ON a.ArtistId = al.ArtistId
INNER JOIN Track t ON al.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
INNER JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.ArtistId, a.Name
ORDER BY TotalSales DESC
LIMIT 10;

question: Can you show the distribution of sales across different media types?
content:
SELECT mt.Name AS MediaType, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalSales
FROM MediaType mt
JOIN Track t ON mt.MediaTypeId = t.MediaTypeId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY mt.MediaTypeId, mt.Name;

question: What are the top 10 most purchased albums?
content:
SELECT a.AlbumId, a.Title, SUM(il.Quantity) AS TotalPurchases
FROM Album a
JOIN Track t ON a.AlbumId = t.AlbumId
JOIN InvoiceLine il ON t.TrackId = il.TrackId
GROUP BY a.AlbumId, a.Title
ORDER BY TotalPurchases DESC
LIMIT 10;
